title: Information Security Manager
subtitle: Cybersecurity Leadership and Risk Management
description: Master information security management, cybersecurity frameworks, risk assessment, and security governance. Learn incident response, security compliance, threat management, and organizational security strategy.

certification.name: Information Security Manager (ISM)

Conduct security risk assessments and management

Manage security awareness and training programs
